Enhanced TMR Voting Mechanism Test
==================================

=== Testing with type f ===
Original: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)

--- Single Bit Error Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 01000000 01001001 00001111 11011000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Copy2: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Copy3: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Standard Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Bit-Level Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Detected pattern: 0
Adaptive Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)

--- Adjacent Bits Error Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 01000000 01001001 00000011 11010000  (decimal: 3.14086)
Copy2: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Copy3: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Standard Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Bit-Level Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Detected pattern: 2
Adaptive Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)

--- Byte Error Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 01000000 01001001 00001111 00101111  (decimal: 3.14155)
Copy2: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Copy3: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Standard Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Bit-Level Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Burst Error Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Detected pattern: 2
Adaptive Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)

--- Word Error Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 10111111 10110110 11110000 00101111  (decimal: -1.4292)
Copy2: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Copy3: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Standard Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Word Error Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Detected pattern: 3
Adaptive Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)

--- Burst Error Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 01000000 01001000 11111111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14061)
Copy2: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Copy3: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Standard Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Burst Error Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Detected pattern: 4
Adaptive Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)

--- Multiple Copy Corruption Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 01000000 01001001 00001111 11110000  (decimal: 3.1416)
Copy2 (corrupted): 01000000 01001001 10001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.1494)
Copy3: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Standard Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Bit-Level Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Detected pattern: 0
Adaptive Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)

--- Extreme Case: All Copies Corrupted ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 01000000 01001001 00001111 01010000  (decimal: 3.14156)
Copy2 (corrupted): 01000000 01001001 00001110 11010000  (decimal: 3.14153)
Copy3 (corrupted): 01000000 01001001 00001101 11010000  (decimal: 3.14147)
Standard Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Bit-Level Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Word Error Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Burst Error Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Detected pattern: 5
Adaptive Vote Result: 01000000 01001001 00001111 11010000  (decimal: 3.14159)
Error rates:
Standard voting: 0%
Bit-level voting: 0%
Word error voting: 0%
Burst error voting: 0%
Adaptive voting: 0%

=== Testing with type d ===
Original: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)

--- Single Bit Error Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10011000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Copy2: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Copy3: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Standard Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Bit-Level Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Detected pattern: 0
Adaptive Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)

--- Adjacent Bits Error Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11111011 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Copy2: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Copy3: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Standard Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Bit-Level Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Detected pattern: 2
Adaptive Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)

--- Byte Error Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 01101111  (decimal: 2.71828)
Copy2: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Copy3: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Standard Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Bit-Level Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Burst Error Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Detected pattern: 2
Adaptive Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)

--- Word Error Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 10111111 11111010 01000000 11110110 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: -1.64086)
Copy2: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Copy3: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Standard Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Word Error Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Detected pattern: 2
Adaptive Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)

--- Burst Error Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101011 00000111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Copy2: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Copy3: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Standard Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Burst Error Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Detected pattern: 3
Adaptive Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)

--- Multiple Copy Corruption Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10110000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Copy2 (corrupted): 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 01110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Copy3: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Standard Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Bit-Level Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Detected pattern: 0
Adaptive Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)

--- Extreme Case: All Copies Corrupted ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 00010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Copy2 (corrupted): 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110110 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Copy3 (corrupted): 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110101 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Standard Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Bit-Level Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Word Error Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Burst Error Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Detected pattern: 3
Adaptive Vote Result: 01000000 00000101 10111111 00001001 10010101 10101010 11110111 10010000  (decimal: 2.71828)
Error rates:

Bit-level voting: 0%
Word error voting: 0%
Burst error voting: 0%

=== Testing with type i ===
Original: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)

--- Single Bit Error Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 00000000 00000000 00000000 00100010  (decimal: 34)
Copy2: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Copy3: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Standard Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Bit-Level Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Detected pattern: 0
Adaptive Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)

--- Adjacent Bits Error Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 00000000 00000000 00001100 00101010  (decimal: 3114)
Copy2: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Copy3: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Standard Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Bit-Level Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Detected pattern: 2
Adaptive Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)

--- Byte Error Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 00000000 00000000 00000000 11010101  (decimal: 213)
Copy2: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Copy3: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Standard Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Bit-Level Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Burst Error Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Detected pattern: 2
Adaptive Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)

--- Word Error Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 11111111 11111111 11111111 11010101  (decimal: -43)
Copy2: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Copy3: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Standard Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Word Error Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Detected pattern: 3
Adaptive Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)

--- Burst Error Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 00000000 00000001 11110000 00101010  (decimal: 127018)
Copy2: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Copy3: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Standard Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Burst Error Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Detected pattern: 4
Adaptive Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)

--- Multiple Copy Corruption Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 00000000 00000000 00000000 00001010  (decimal: 10)
Copy2 (corrupted): 00000000 00000000 10000000 00101010  (decimal: 32810)
Copy3: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Standard Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Bit-Level Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Detected pattern: 0
Adaptive Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)

--- Extreme Case: All Copies Corrupted ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 00000000 00000000 00000000 10101010  (decimal: 170)
Copy2 (corrupted): 00000000 00000000 00000001 00101010  (decimal: 298)
Copy3 (corrupted): 00000000 00000000 00000010 00101010  (decimal: 554)
Standard Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Bit-Level Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Word Error Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Burst Error Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)
Detected pattern: 5
Adaptive Vote Result: 00000000 00000000 00000000 00101010  (decimal: 42)

=== Testing with type x ===
Original: 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111  (decimal: 9223372036854775807)

--- Single Bit Error Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11110111  (decimal: 9223372036854775799)
Copy2: 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111  (decimal: 9223372036854775807)
Copy3: 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111  (decimal: 9223372036854775807)
Standard Vote Result: 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111  (decimal: 9223372036854775807)
Bit-Level Vote Result: 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111  (decimal: 9223372036854775807)
Detected pattern: 0
Adaptive Vote Result: 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111  (decimal: 9223372036854775807)

--- Adjacent Bits Error Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11110011 11111111  (decimal: 9223372036854772735)
Copy2: 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111  (decimal: 9223372036854775807)
Copy3: 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111  (decimal: 9223372036854775807)
Standard Vote Result: 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111  (decimal: 9223372036854775807)
Bit-Level Vote Result: 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111  (decimal: 9223372036854775807)
Detected pattern: 2
Adaptive Vote Result: 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111  (decimal: 9223372036854775807)

--- Byte Error Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 00000000  (decimal: 9223372036854775552)
Copy2: 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111  (decimal: 9223372036854775807)
Copy3: 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111  (decimal: 9223372036854775807)
Standard Vote Result: 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111  (decimal: 9223372036854775807)
Bit-Level Vote Result: 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111  (decimal: 9223372036854775807)
Burst Error Vote Result: 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111  (decimal: 9223372036854775807)
Detected pattern: 2
Adaptive Vote Result: 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111  (decimal: 9223372036854775807)

--- Word Error Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 10000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111  (decimal: -9223372032559808513)
Copy2: 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111  (decimal: 9223372036854775807)

Adaptive Vote Result: 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111  (decimal: 9223372036854775807)

--- Burst Error Test ---
Copy1 (corrupted): 01111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111111 11111110 00001111 11111111  (decimal: 9223372036854648831)
